titleStmt.title: Iter Carolinum being a succinct relation of the necessitated marches, retreats, and sufferings, of His Majesty Charls the I from January 10, 1641, till the time of his death 1648 / collected by a daily attendant upon His Sacred Majesty during all the said time.
titleStmt.author: Walker, Edward, Sir, 1612-1677.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Walker. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
